I've been running a few times this test and it does not fail for me. However, when I enabled the vpn it failed consistently. Is this your case? Do you have multiple network interfaces up and running?

I created a solution for this problem in the branch 'multicast'. Here, we use multicast instead of broadcast for the discovery and a few options for tuning the sockets. This will be a separate pull request if we confirm the problem. By the way, the problem is that the test is checking that an advertise with the 'Host scope option' works. This option filters any discovery message that is not coming from a node running on your local machine. The problem appears because you bind to an interface but the src IP contained in the discovery messages is different, so discovery thinks it comes from a different machine and it's discarded.
